title: fromindia
author: fromindia
content: I have figured out 2 private keys having Bitcoin. One private key is holding 0.002 btc and another is holding 0.134 BTCI need urgent money and I think if I take this fund at my wallet my problem will be solved.One private key - last transaction was 2014Another one- last transaction 2013I think it is 10 years +Should I take this fund? I need very urgent money. Without fund, my life is becoming horrible. I have lost all and have fallen under big debt due to gambling. So, I have lost to others.So, 1. From the moral point of view, should I take this fund?2. If I take this fund, will I be caught? Is there any way getting my identity while shifting fund?

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: You "figured out" 2 private keys? Supposing what you're saying is true, that's interesting. Can you please provide more information as to this figuring out? There probably are three possibilities: 1. You stole them, 2. You accidentally found them, 3. You generated them from their addresses. Since the third is virtually impossible, it's only between 1 & 2. You might want to tell us more.Regardless, however, the funds aren't yours. Therefore, you have no right to spend them. As to whether you'll be caught and your identity known, it has yet to be known. It depends on the investigators, but have you been strictly private in all your dealings in the past? Are you confident you can hide like Satoshi Nakamoto?

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 02:25:36 AMI have figured out 2 private keys having Bitcoin. One private key is holding 0.002 btc and another is holding 0.134 BTCI need urgent money and I think if I take this fund at my wallet my problem will be solved.One private key - last transaction was 2014Another one- last transaction 20131. From the moral point of view, should I take this fund?2. If I take this fund, will I be caught? Is there any way getting my identity while shifting fund?You say something makes me feel like that is your wallet (you wrote "my wallet").If two wallets are yours, you are free to move your bitcoin but your questions make me think different, these wallets are not yours. And you want to know that will you be reported to police, get arrested if the real owners of two wallets know that their bitcoin is stolen by you.Your information is strange as figuring out private keys of other bitcoin owners is impossible, if you don't hack their computers and get access to their wallets.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: If anybody have usdt I want to exchange Bitcoin at lower cost

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Don’t waste your time with him. OP is a scammer. Check his trust page and the references linked there. This is not the first time he has tried this sort of scam trick. I believe he created this thread to see if he can get users who will be interested in “figuring out” private keys of old bitcoin wallets with balance. Edit:Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 03:14:59 AMIf anybody have usdt I want to exchange Bitcoin at lower costHis true intentions have been revealed.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: I want to keep this Bitcoin as collateral. Straight forward

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: I don't think you "figured out nothing". Because if you did, the public space is the last place you would come to for any advice. You know that no one will be in support of whatever you are planning to do. You would have long used the funds to sort out your life without the knowledge of the public and kept it private.But since you askedSo,1. NO2. Yes you will. No, there is none. Even if you did, you will be caught anyways.

comments.author: SickDayIn
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 02:25:36 AMI have figured out 2 private keys having Bitcoin. One private key is holding 0.002 btc and another is holding 0.134 BTCI need urgent money and I think if I take this fund at my wallet my problem will be solved.One private key - last transaction was 2014Another one- last transaction 2013I think it is 10 years +Should I take this fund? I need very urgent money. Without fund, my life is becoming horrible. I have lost all and have fallen under big debt due to gambling. So, I have lost to others.So, 1. From the moral point of view, should I take this fund?2. If I take this fund, will I be caught? Is there any way getting my identity while shifting fund?You should only sell your Bitcoin if your live is in danger, or you/your family will be significantly affected. If you have a mortgage and you can't make the payment or you will lose your house, then yes sell your Bitcoin.If you have a debt with a loan shark because you gambled away some money, then yes sell your Bitcoin.However, you should consider exhausting all other options first. Is there any property or assets you have at home you don't need anymore, can you sell that?

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: @OP is lying, he didn't have figured out any address.He want to make people interested to lend him money by using this "fake private keys" or he might want to sell those fake private keys at discount rate.Check @OP trust summary, he was trying to scam people by promoting ponzi scheme.Get a job dude, McDonald is still looking for waitress.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: I would becareful because this could be a scam attempt.I think he is waiting to get DM and he will tell people how he got those private keys. I am assuming he has some bitcoin private key cracker which is most likely a virus.This thread is highly suspicious in my opinion and I would becareful if you get a DM from this person.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.created_time: June 30, 2024, 07:23:25 AMLast edit: June 30, 2024, 07:33:29 AM by fromindia
comments.body: I have already shifted the fund in binance. How will I be caught? I need urgent money so I have no moral. Nobody is expressing moral in the world. All are fake. Thing is that everybody has his/her purchase value according to his/her asset. So everybody is lying, only I am telling the truth.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: What do you mean “figured out”?If you managed to generate private keys from out of nowhere, bitcoin’s security will be questioned and the system must not be working properly which will create a whole shift in the community. Please be careful with your claims especially if you cannot prove them.This is not a question of morality but also a question of effectiveness of bitcoin.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: Well I am giving you a clue. I have worked over 15 days.1. Download all Bitcoin address with funds database around 2GB2. Create python program that will create password containing uppercase and lowercase: Total 26+26 = 52 and only 6 special char @#$&!*So total 58Now length 4 = 58*58*58*58Create private key and corresponding addresses. Compare it with your database. You will find one address. Now find private key with it. You will find one. I have already shifted the fund.2. For second one, similar method but different length

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 03:14:59 AMIf anybody have usdt I want to exchange Bitcoin at lower costGood plan. Finally you said what you really want.If you don't want the Bitcoin from the two addresses with the private keys you hold to cash out because it's urgent, you can ask for a loan from someone you know in real life. If they are not willing to give it, then you are not trustworthy.Good luck with your plan bro.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: I have already taken the bitcoin. No need a loan . I will try to exploit another wallet

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 08:44:50 AMI have already taken the bitcoin. No need a loan . I will try to exploit another walletYou are a really strange person, why do you write about the suspicious and illegal things you do in a public space and then ask people for advice to help you spend the money you obtained illegally?Now you say that you will try to exploit another wallet. I think the reason is your addiction to gambling. You need money to compensate for your losses in gambling, and instead of letting gambling go towards illegal actions, I advise you to quit gambling before you find yourself in prison.It seems that you have great skills, why don't you use them in useful things through which you can get money instead of getting it illegally?

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 02:25:36 AMI have figured out 2 private keys having Bitcoin. One private key is holding 0.002 btc and another is holding 0.134 BTCI need urgent money and I think if I take this fund at my wallet my problem will be solved.One private key - last transaction was 2014Another one- last transaction 2013I think it is 10 years +Should I take this fund? I need very urgent money. Without fund, my life is becoming horrible. I have lost all and have fallen under big debt due to gambling. So, I have lost to others.So, 1. From the moral point of view, should I take this fund?2. If I take this fund, will I be caught? Is there any way getting my identity while shifting fund?Even if those wallets is dormant and the owner is not around to take it still you don't have any rights to take out those funds. Remember its not yours so better leave it there. If you decide to take it then you are similar to thief since you take the money which is not yours. If you have financial problems better work for it and don't get someone's belonging just to solve your problem since that's not really ideal thing or option to do. But since you said that you already taken out that bitcoin then I guess that determine what type of person you are. So hopefully no one here will follow what you do.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: I have solid skill on programming. I earned 40 USD per hour in Elance. Also managed a big sum of of money. I lost all in binary option trading and gambling. To recover losses l took loan from bank. I lost those too. Then I took loan from loan shark to recover everything. Unfortunately I lost all. Now banks and loansharks are behind be to pay quickly. If I try to manage fund from freelancing or job,  I can earn less than installment with respect to the lenders installment. So, it is forcing me to find out way to steal crypto and finding out ways of vulnerabilities in smart contract. Sorry, I was very honest few years ago. Also sorry to god. My fortune has made me such.Conclusion : Poverty....... Knows no law.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: fromindia on June 30, 2024, 10:25:44 AMI have solid skill on programming. I earned 40 USD per hour in Elance. Also managed a big sum of of money. I lost all in binary option trading and gambling. To recover losses l took loan from bank. I lost those too. Then I took loan from loan shark to recover everything. Unfortunately I lost all. Now banks and loansharks are behind be to pay quickly. If I try to manage fund from freelancing or job,  I can earn less than installment with respect to the lenders installment. So, it is forcing me to find out way to steal crypto and finding out ways of vulnerabilities in smart contract. Sorry, I was very honest few years ago. Also sorry to god. My fortune has made me such.Conclusion : Poverty....... Knows no law.You caused your problem by yourself and you think you can solve your problem by causing more problems for others and the society at large. If you lost your money through trading and gambling, it is your fault because nobody is forced to engage in it. Now you want to steal from others to cover your losses. Regardless of how much you get, if you don't handle your unhealthy gambling behavior, you will go deeper into debt. You should handle your gambling addiction and focus on your programming skills. There is no excuse for stealing people's funds. Some people are in the same condition as you but they are seeking other legal means to become financially stable. Finally, you will soon be caught and convicted for stealing. Maybe you might not have access to this forum because you might be in jail serving your punishment for stealing.

comments.author: fromindia
comments.body: Not by myself. You heard about the name amazonet.com I saw their advertise on google and Facebook. Going to them I lost around 27k.Now tell me who will take this responsibility? Why did google show their advertise?
